00026 #define clRed (unsigned int)QColor(Qt::red).rgb()

00033 template <typename T>
00034 struct Vector4 {
00035     Vector4() : x(0), y(0), z(0), w(1) {}
00036     Vector4(const Vector4 &v) : x(v.x), y(v.y), z(v.z), w(v.w) {}
00037     Vector4(T nx, T ny, T nz = 0, T nw = 1) : x(nx), y(ny), z(nz), w(nw) {} 
00038     T x, y, z, w;
00039     //! operators below do not take weights into account.
00040     bool operator==(const Vector4 &s1)  const {return ((x == s1.x) && (y == s1.y) && (z == s1.z));}
00041     Vector4 &operator+=(const Vector4<T> &s1) {
00042         x += s1.x; y += s1.y; z += s1.z;
00043         return *this;
00044     }
00045     Vector4 &operator-=(const Vector4 &s1) {
00046         x -= s1.x; y -= s1.y; z -= s1.z;
00047         return *this;
00048     }
00049     Vector4 &operator*=(T k) {
00050         x *= k; y *= k; z *= k;
00051         return *this;
00052     }
00053     //! square of distance between this and a point
00054     T distance2(const Vector4 &s1) const {
00055         T x1 = x - s1.x;
00056         T y1 = y - s1.y;
00057         T z1 = z - s1.z;
00058         return x1*x1 + y1*y1 + z1*z1;
00059     }
00060     //! square of distance between this and a line from s1 to s2
00061     T distance2(const Vector4 &s1, const Vector4 &s2) const  {
00062         T x1 = x - s1.x;
00063         T y1 = y - s1.y;
00064         T z1 = z - s1.z;
00065         T x2 = s2.x - s1.x;
00066         T y2 = s2.y - s1.y;
00067         T z2 = s2.z - s1.z;
00068         T zbab = x1*x2 + y1*y2 + z1*z2;
00069         T ab2 = x2*x2 + y2*y2 + z2*z2;
00070         T zb2 = x1*x1 + y1*y1 + z1*z1;
00071         return (zb2*ab2 - zbab*zbab) / ab2;
00072     }
00073     void normalize() {
00074         T ir = (T)1.0 / sqrtf(x*x + y*y + z*z);
00075         x *= ir; y *= ir; z *= ir;
00076     }
00077     Vector4 &vectorProduct(const Vector4 &s1) {
00078         Vector4 s2;
00079         s2.x = y * s1.z - z * s1.y;
00080         s2.y = z * s1.x - x * s1.z;
00081         s2.z = x * s1.y - y * s1.x;
00082         *this = s2;
00083         return *this;
00084     }
00085     T innerProduct(const Vector4 &s1) const {
00086         return x * s1.x + y * s1.y + z * s1.z;
00087     }
00088 };

00099 //! XGraph object can have one or more plots and two or more axes.
00100 //! \sa XPlot, XAxis, XQGraphPainter
00101 class XGraph : public XNode
00102 {
00103     XNODE_OBJECT
00104 protected:
00105     XGraph(const char *name, bool runtime);
00106 public:
00107     virtual XString getLabel() const {return *label();}
00108 
00109     typedef float SFloat;
00110     static const SFloat SFLOAT_MAX;
00111     typedef float GFloat;
00112     static const GFloat GFLOAT_MAX;
00113     typedef double VFloat;
00114     static const VFloat VFLOAT_MAX;
00115     typedef Vector4<SFloat> ScrPoint;
00116     typedef Vector4<GFloat> GPoint;
00117     typedef Vector4<VFloat> ValPoint;
00118  
00119     //! call me before redraw graph
00120     //! Fix axes, take snapshot of points, autoscale axes
00121     void setupRedraw(float resolution);
00122   
00123     void zoomAxes(float resolution, XGraph::SFloat zoomscale,
00124                   const XGraph::ScrPoint &zoomcenter);
00125 
00126     const shared_ptr<XAxisList> &axes() const {return m_axes;}
00127     const shared_ptr<XPlotList> &plots() const {return m_plots;} 
00128 
00129     const shared_ptr<XStringNode> &label() const {return m_label;}
00130     const shared_ptr<XHexNode> &backGround() const {return m_backGround;}
00131     const shared_ptr<XHexNode> &titleColor() const {return m_titleColor;}
00132 
00133     const shared_ptr<XBoolNode> &drawLegends() const {return m_drawLegends;}
00134 
00135     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> &persistence() const {return m_persistence;}
00136     //! signal to redraw
00137     void requestUpdate();
00138     bool isUpdateScheduled() const {return m_bUpdateScheduled;}
00139     //! postpone signals to redraw
00140     void lock();
00141     //! reschedule signals to redraw
00142     void unlock();
00143 
00144     XTalker<shared_ptr<XGraph> > &onUpdate() {return m_tlkOnUpdate;}
00145     const shared_ptr<XListener> &lsnPropertyChanged() const {return m_lsnPropertyChanged;}
00146 protected:
00147 private:
00148     void onPropertyChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &);
00149 
00150     bool m_bUpdateScheduled;
00151     XRecursiveRWLock m_graphLock;
00152 
00153     const shared_ptr<XStringNode> m_label;
00154     shared_ptr<XListener> m_lsnPropertyChanged;
00155   
00156     const shared_ptr<XAxisList> m_axes;
00157     const shared_ptr<XPlotList> m_plots; 
00158 
00159     const shared_ptr<XHexNode> m_backGround;

00161 
00162     const shared_ptr<XBoolNode> m_drawLegends;
00163 
00164     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> m_persistence;
00165     XTalker<shared_ptr<XGraph> > m_tlkOnUpdate;
00166 };
